title: If no webapps deployed, accessing a URL returns 200 OK with no content instead of 404
description: Accessing a URL in Tomcat 7 with no webapps deployed returns HTTP code 200 OK with no content, instead of an HTTP error 404.
OB: When starting a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed and accessing a URL, it returns HTTP code 200 OK with no content.
EB: When starting a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed and accessing a URL, it should return an HTTP error 404 instead of HTTP code 200 OK with no content.
SR:
1. Download and install Tomcat 7.
2. Start the Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed.
3. Access a URL.
4. Verify that the response is an HTTP error 404.
